post.author: 배길상
post.content:
One of agent contact to me for the following candidate.
If anyone interested call me (647-294-6953) or contact to Chebrolu
at 416-526-2401(m) or 416-225-9900 ext 4394.

Job Title: Systems Analyst    
Job Location: Canada-Ontario-Whitby    
Additional Location Details: 920 Champlain Crt    

    
Start Date of Employment: ASAP    
# of Positions Available: 1    
Job Type: CONT, FT    
Contract Duration: 9 Months    

Minimum Years Working Experience Required: 4    
Minimum Security Clearance Required:    

Job Description: Systems Analyst

Qualifications:              

o        Development on an iSeries using I RPGIII, RPG IV,  and CL.

o        Minimum 4 to 5 years of Systems Analysis experience in medium to large projects as well as

multi projects using the iSeries (AS400).

o        Some automobile business knowledge; Finance/Accounting  and Aftersales parts and service business

knowledge would be a benefit.

o        Strong analytical skills with the ability to evaluate, review, system test and do analysis

o        Interpersonal skills

o        Strong communications - verbal and written

o        Strong process skills; ability to develop processes, evaluate processes, recommend options for improvement
post.title: AS/400 Systems Analyst 9 months contract.
